entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 13. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
